title: Development and characterization of three-dimensional antibacterial nanocomposite sponges of chitosan, silver nanoparticles and halloysite nanotubes
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,24910-24927
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04274C, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
A. Hernández-Rangel, P. Silva-Bermudez, A. Almaguer-Flores, V. I. García, R. Esparza, G. Luna-Bárcenas, C. Velasquillo
We have developed novel three-dimensional scaffolds composed of chitosan, halloysite nanotubes and silver nanoparticles with enhanced antimicrobial activity and fibroblast cell compatibility for their potential use in wound dressing applications.
